subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Texas A&M’s Johnny Manziel owns some staggering career statistics, but his real magic is his grit and exuberance, the kind of pure joy an 8-year-old can appreciate.
snippet: Texas A&M’s Johnny Manziel owns some staggering career statistics, but his real magic is his grit and exuberance, the kind of pure joy an 8-year-old can appreciate.
